name: Do Nigerian women really flowers?
description: I normally pretend to love flowers but what I would appreciate is a bouquet of dollars.
author: Omo

name: Why you should love mangoes
description: I heard some people eat mango skin and I am thankful I wasn't born upside down.
author: Fums

name: What type of candy is this?
description: Jolly ranchers is only for the cool. i have never had it but I like the name.
author: Salim
